1627651902_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnX.body:
thank you, i can select the certificate even without Page.cmd("certSelect"...  being in .js file i have added cert_signers as shown but it seems to require also lines:
```
"bitid/.@kxoid.bit": {"max_size": 4000000},
"bitmsg/.@kxoid.bit": {"max_size": 4000000}
```
then it started publishing to peers (note that all lines, except last have to end by ","
after i added third ID provider to the end:
```
   "bitid/.*@kaffie.bit": {"max_size": 4000000},
   "bitmsg/.*@kaffie.bit": {"max_size": 4000000}
```
somehow it not publish for kaffie but it does for kxoid and zeroid :-S
btw zeroid and kxoid are only ones that works to publish [among all i have tried](/1TaLkFrMwvbNsooF4ioKAY9EuxTBTjipT/?Topic:1517337097_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnXadUtS#Menu).
